description: This issue is related to different values that MSVM_ComputerSystem's Caption property can have on different locales.
title: The Hyper-V driver's list_instances() returns an empty result set on certain localized versions of the OS

comments.content: This issue is related to different values that MSVM_ComputerSystem's Caption property can have on different locales.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alexpilotti

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/82409
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: We use milestones only at the very end of the milestone to track bugs that should block the release of the milestone. Please use tags not milestones to track bugs, try things like: my_bug_topic_milestone_name
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~johngarbutt

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/82409
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=a5405fa3532d9dd3d33e848f36cc6530e74e6bb7
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit a5405fa3532d9dd3d33e848f36cc6530e74e6bb7
Author: Alessandro Pilotti <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Mar 24 03:11:04 2014 +0200

    Fixes a Hyper-V list_instances localization issue
    
    The Hyper-V WMI MSVM_ComputerSystem class Caption property can
    have different values on various locales. This patch uses a
    different query to avoid any localization issue.
    
    Co-Authored-By: Robert Tingirica <email address hidden>
    Change-Id: I15103b8edb3ff8934c835826ed00e08593cdeacc
    Closes-Bug: #1296478
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:

    Fixes a Hyper-V list_instances localization issue
    
    The Hyper-V WMI MSVM_ComputerSystem class Caption property can
